title: Chapter 4447 - Chapter 4447: 4,446 Chaos-Level Behemoths
body:
Chapter 4447 - Chapter 4447: 4,446 Chaos-Level Behemoths

Chapter 4447: 4,446 chaos-level behemoths

“If the twelve origin stones are gathered together, is it within a tribe or is it ownerless? If it is within a tribe of chaos-level behemoths, it should be a very powerful tribe.”

“However, hope is ownerless.”

Wang Xian thought to himself, but his hands did not stop moving.

He held the divination lamp and continued divination.

Buzz! Buzz

However, this time, when he was doing his divination, the entire divination lamp started to sway.

The light under the lamp gradually began to turn illusory.

Wang Xian was slightly stunned when he saw this scene. A look of astonishment appeared on his face.

“This is?”

A solemn expression appeared on his face as he channeled his powerful divination power into it.

Very soon, the illusory image of a gigantic beast of chaos appeared under the divination lamp.

It was a gigantic beast of chaos with a terrifying pair of eyes.

Its gigantic pupils took up four-fifths of its head.

Its gigantic pupils were filled with all kinds of terrifying energy.

The body behind it was like a snake’s tail, swaying in the void.

“Chaos Level!”

Wang Xian’s eyes narrowed, and there was a hint of shock on his face.

Prophet Hong and the rest told him that there might be existences of the level of chaos at the bottom of the land of origin.

Now, he had really encountered one.

This was the first existence of the level of chaos that Wang Xian had encountered.

Buzz

Buzz! Buzz

At this moment, Wang Xian suddenly noticed that there was a slight change in the illusion of the gigantic beast of chaos under the divination lamp.

The illusion of the Chaos Beast seemed to have come to life as it looked at him with slight sensing.

When Wang Xian saw this scene, his heart trembled.

He quickly cut off the divination lamp.

“Has he been discovered?”

Wang Xian’s eyes flickered.

A top-notch expert might have a premonition when he was divined.

Now, he had also been sensed by the chaos beast when he was divining.

“This hundun-level existence is probably not weak. It should be stronger than the ordinary hundun-level existences.”

Wang Xian thought to himself with a hesitant look on his face.

Although Wang Xian’s current strength was comparable to two hundun-level existences.

However, it was too difficult to snatch something from a hundun-level existence.

“Why don’t I give it a try and use my divination power to try? Besides, I can experience the powers of other hundun-level existences.”

Wang Xian pondered in his heart and quickly made up his mind.

I should go and experience it.

I will act as I say.

He immediately flew towards the area where the Giant Beast of Primal Chaos was located.

“I’m almost there!”

He flew all the way in.

When he sensed the existence of the giant beast of primal chaos level, he thought to himself.

Buzz

When he flew forward for a distance again, Wang Xian suddenly sensed that he seemed to have entered a special domain.

Buzz Buzz

At this moment, Wang Xian felt that he was being spied on.

This made his heart skip a beat!

He had been discovered!

Boom Boom

In the next moment, the chaos-level existence with a huge single eye appeared in front of Wang Xian instantly.

Wang Xian could feel the surrounding void starting to fluctuate.

Waves of pressure were coming from his surroundings.

At the same time, a special energy was attacking him.

The power of this attack was extremely terrifying!

Buzz

Wang Xian’s body trembled. The power of space enveloped him, forming a safe spatial domain around him.

Wang Xian did not take the initiative to attack. He was still looking at this chaos-level existence curiously.

Dong! Dong

At this moment, the chaos-level existence opposite him started to move.

His terrifying pupils emitted a thick energy.

This was a very special energy.

The energy contained space, flames, and other strange energies.

The terrifying energy rays came directly in front of Wang Xian.

It almost ignored the attack of space.

It was completely comparable to the ultimate treasure of the Wheel of nothingness, the Heaven’s origin creation.

Wang Xian saw it and transformed into the body of a divine dragon.

The Dragon Claw stretched out.

The Dragon Claw formed by the power of Chaos went straight for the energy ray.

“Bang!”

A huge collision sound was heard.

“Buzz Buzz Buzz!”

At this moment, that chaos-level existence turned into multiple clones.

More than ten clones surrounded Wang Xian in an instant.

Even Wang Xian couldn’t see the ability clearly in that instant.

“This should be the domain of this chaos-level existence. Within its domain, its strength can be greatly enhanced.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

“Dong Dong Dong!”

“Dong Dong Dong!”

More than ten shadows that surrounded Wang Xian shot out more than ten terrifying energies.

The energy swept out and covered the entire space around Wang Xian!

Under his senses, the surrounding area had been locked down.

If it was just ordinary space power, it would be impossible to teleport even if he had the time.

Fortunately, Wang Xian was in control of the dark and violent mutated space power.

With a move of his body, the divination lamp appeared in front of him.

He immediately divined the real body and weaknesses of this chaos-level existence.

“All of them are real bodies.”

“There are no weaknesses!”

Soon, Wang Xian received a piece of information that surprised him.

Each of these more than ten clones were real bodies.

There were no weaknesses on their bodies.

“To be able to become a chaos-level existence, he is really not simple!”

Wang Xian used the mutated space energy to teleport behind a real body. His dragon horn bloomed with the mutated space energy.

The chaotic power of space slashed towards an actual body.

“PFFT! PFFT! PFFT! PFFT!”

“PFFT! PFFT! PFFT!”

The body of this chaotic behemoth suddenly emitted a luster.

All the real bodies in the surroundings dimmed down.

It was as if they were augmented with energy, increasing the defensive power of this real body.

“Bang! Bang!”

However, Wang Xian’s powerful strength still broke through its defense, leaving numerous wounds on its body.

Although the wounds were not serious, they had broken through his defense.

This was very important for the battle between the strong.

“Dong Dong!”

“Dong Dong!”

At this moment, numerous pupils that were filled with violence and chaos gathered around Wang Xian.

Each pupil seemed to have a life of its own as they attacked him.

Wang Xian saw that he did not dodge. The power of chaos transformed into endless earth attributes and condensed into numerous defenses.

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

The sounds of collisions and explosions rang out. However, Wang Xian’s defense was able to withstand its attack.

“My strength is above his. However, this place seems to be the domain of this chaos-level existence. It’s impossible for me to kill it.”

“I can leave now!”

Wang Xian didn’t hesitate any longer. He moved and left immediately.

“I didn’t expect to meet a chaos-level existence so quickly. How many chaos-level existences are there in the entire land of origin?”

Wang Xian mumbled. He hesitated for a moment and decided to return first.

He wasn’t in a hurry anyway. He would go back and absorb these stones of origin first.
